filmJson.name: Phantoscope
filmJson.developedBy: Charles Francis Jenkins & Thomas Armat (Edison Company)
filmJson.fact1: This was one of the first projectors ever created and the first projector to use 35mm film
filmJson.fact2: This format should not be confused with the Phantascope, which was a motion magic lantern developed around the same time
filmJson.fact3: Through a deal with the Edison Company, this format would be marketed as the Vitascope
